name: Joshua was Here
description:
Joshua was here. So was Kim. And Kevin. And Harlow. And Hank. And...

Explore absolute insanity in this meta-narrative about Joshua and his life. Poke fun at the narrator and his story to explore a tale about as deep as a kiddy pool. Filled with pop culture reference, everything including amongus, Genshin Impact, wordle, the trolley problem, copy pastas, giving up on all that's holy, High Major Commodore of the Second Legion Fourth Division Second Multiplication Double Admiral Artillery Vanguard Company and everything in between. Good luck, have fun and remember: Joshua was here.

Made using Twine
